about_the_game:
Draw your viewers into a fascinating world of flowing sparks and animated shimmering elements.

In this pack, you'll find:
10 intro videos
detailed_description:
Draw your viewers into a fascinating world of flowing sparks and animated shimmering elements.

In this pack, you'll find:
10 intro videos

mac_requirements.minimum:
Konfiguracja minimalna:
  • System operacyjny: Mac OS Х® 10.13.6 or higher
  • Procesor: 64-bit Intel® processor
  • Pamięć: 2 GB RAM
  • Karta graficzna: Intel® HD Graphics 2000, NVIDIA® GeForce® series 8 and 8M, Quadro FX 4800, Quadro FX 5600, AMD Radeon™ R600, Mobility Radeon™ HD 4330, Mobility FirePro™ series, Radeon™ R5 M230 or higher graphics card with up-to-date drivers
  • Miejsce na dysku: 600 MB dostępnej przestrzeni
